common.description: Common cards represent the baseline power level in the game. They are the most frequently found cards and provide a solid foundation for your deck.

uncommon.description: Uncommon cards offer a step up in power compared to common cards. They possess increased strength and can give you an advantage in battles.

rare.description: Rare cards are harder to come by but provide a significant power boost to your deck. They possess impressive strength and can turn the tide of battles in your favor.

epic.description: Epic cards are the epitome of power and rarity in the game. They are exceptionally rare and possess unparalleled strength.

legendary.description: Legendary cards are the legends of the Realms of Glory. They are exceedingly rare, coveted by collectors and warriors alike and possess formidable power.

divine.description: A deck containing Divine cards is a force to be reckoned with, capable of achieving feats of glory beyond imagination. They are the ultimate pinnacle of power in the Realms of Glory in every card category.
